channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vance says redistricting push is a way to make representation "a little bit more fair"
item.description: Vice President JD Vance framed President Trump 's push for red states to redistrict ahead of the 2026 midterms as an attempt "to make the situation a ...

item.title: Inside Trump's American identity project
item.description: Through immigration crackdowns and cultural purges, President Trump is wielding government power to enforce a more rigid, exclusionary definition of w...

item.title: "No authority": Dems flame Trump's proposed Chicago crackdown
item.description: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-N.Y.) said in a Sunday interview that President Trump's threats to crack down on crime in Chicago without a r...

item.title: European shippers cut U.S. off as tariff deadline nears
item.description: A number of European postal agencies have started pausing or cutting off shipments to the U.S., citing uncertainty over the end of the so-called de mi...

item.title: RFK Jr., allies rush to rally the MAHA movement for 2026
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is already working to rally his MAHA ( Make America Healthy Again) movement as a critical constituency for keep...

item.title: On WhatsApp, Palestinians in the U.S. look for food for Gaza — and mourn
item.description: The group chat provides a place for members to share their grief as tragedy after tragedy unfolds in the tiny enclave.

item.title: The House Freedom Caucus is under renovation
item.description: The far-right caucus is losing several of its most prominent members, creating an opening for new leaders and new approaches.

item.title: At Harvard, Trump administration cuts hit young scientists hard

item.title: Newly released Epstein files fall short of full transparency, Democrats say
item.description: While some far-right influencers hailed fresh vindication for Trump, Democrats blasted the Justice Department for releasing little that’s new about th...

item.title: Trump’s new chief design officer aims to make federal websites ‘satisfying’
item.description: Joe Gebbia, an Elon Musk ally who also worked for DOGE, said navigating dot-gov websites should be just as easy as visiting the Apple Store.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
